meanings.definition: A type of chemotherapy drug used to treat certain types of cancer.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed vinblastines to help fight the cancer cells.
meanings.sent2: The hospital stored various vinblastines to treat different types of cancer.
meanings.sent3: The vinblastines decided to team up and battle the cancer together.
meanings.sent4: Her body welcomed the vinblastines like brave warriors fighting the cancer war.
meanings.sent5: The vinblastines worked tirelessly, like tiny soldiers attacking the cancer army.

meanings.definition: The plural form of vinblastine, referring to multiple doses or types of the drug.
meanings.sent1: She needed to take different vinblastines at different times of the day.
meanings.sent2: The pharmacy stocked various vinblastines for patients with different needs.
meanings.sent3: The vinblastines on the shelf chatted about their experiences in different bodies.
meanings.sent4: The vinblastines in the bottle stood united, ready to combat the illness.
meanings.sent5: Each of the vinblastines had a unique role in fighting the disease.
